title: Wrangler Men's Retro Relaxed Fit Bootcut Jeans
description: RELAXED FIT. This relaxed fit boot cut jean is designed with fashion-forward style. Built with a relaxed fit through the seat, thigh, and knee, our Retro jean sits lower on the waist and leaves plenty of room to fit over your favorite pair of boots

RETRO STYLING. Designed with Retro style in mind, this boot cut jean provides a vintage look for the modern man. Complete with our signature Retro finishes and relaxed fit, this jean will keep you looking good for any occasion

QUALITY MATERIALS. Made from high-quality material, this relaxed fit boot cut jean is constructed for comfort, function, and style. Finished with a unique wash technique - whiskering, handsanding, distressing - each style varies in finishing

ICONIC EMBELLISHMENTS: This boot cut jean is finished with our iconic Wrangler “W” stitching, leather Wrangler patch on the back pocket, and 1947 rivet on the front pocket. Maintain that effortless classic style with a touch of retro
FIVE POCKET STYLING: Constructed with our classic five-pocket jean styling, these boot cut jeans are made with (2) embroidered hip pockets, (1) watch pocket, and (2) front pockets

Since 1947, Wrangler has maintained a relentless commitment to quality apparel built to fit your life. Wrangler fills your closet with authentic snap shirts, tees, jackets and authentic western denim that keep you comfortable in true western style. Our shirts feature iconic details such as pearl snaps, pointed yokes, ‘W’ stitching on the pockets, and spread collars. Jeans come in 100% heavyweight denim or with a bit of stretch for extra comfort and feature a Wrangler patch, W stitching on pockets and classic 5 pocket styling. Crafted with care, our western line is made for men who start their day before the sun comes up and won’t stop working until the job is done. This is Wrangler, made for you.
